user_history.content: i need a restaurant nearby with a nice view

I can recommend a restaurant with a nice view. There are two options in your area: Ulus 29 and Sunset. Both are in Istanbul and have great views. Ulus 29 has an amazing view over the Bosperus and is open for dinner from 18:30 and lunch from 12:00-15:00 from Monday to Friday. Sunset also has a great view, but I couldn
